completeness.description: The extent to which all required steps are successfully completed

accepted_values.partial_completion: Some steps were not completed or partially completed

accuracy.description: The correctness of the provided answer in relation to the real-world question

accepted_values.partially_acurate: The answer is partially correct; some aspects are inaccurate

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow and understand the reasoning process of the agent

accepted_values.fully_traceable: The reasoning process is clear and fully traceable
accepted_values.partially_traceable: Parts of the reasoning process are unclear or not easily traceable
accepted_values.not_traceable: The reasoning process is not traceable

data_reliability.description: The reliability of data sources used by the agent in deriving the answer

accepted_values.high_reliability: Only reliable and verified sources were used
accepted_values.medium_reliability: Mostly reliable sources used with some unverified information
accepted_values.low_reliability: Unreliable or unverified sources were predominantly used

resource_efficiency.description: The efficiency of resource use, including time and computational resources

accepted_values.high_efficiency: Minimal resources were used, task completed quickly
accepted_values.medium_efficiency: A moderate amount of resources were used, task completed in reasonable time
accepted_values.low_efficiency: Excessive resources were used, task took a long time to complete

scalability.description: The ability of the solution to handle increasing amounts of work or scope

accepted_values.highly_scalable: Solution can scale up to handle much larger tasks seamlessly
accepted_values.moderately_scalable: Solution has some scalability but may struggle with significantly larger tasks
accepted_values.not_scalable: Solution is not scalable, only suitable for small or specific tasks

adaptability.description: The ability of the system to adapt to new or changing tasks and conditions

accepted_values.highly_adaptable: System easily adapts to new tasks and conditions
accepted_values.moderately_adaptable: System can adapt with some effort or limitations
accepted_values.not_adaptable: System cannot adapt, is rigid to new tasks or changes

innovativeness.description: The level of creativity or novel approaches employed in the solution

accepted_values.highly_innovative: Solution includes groundbreaking or highly creative approaches
accepted_values.moderately_innovative: Solution includes some new ideas or variations on existing methods
accepted_values.not_innovative: Solution relies on well-known or outdated methods without innovation
